ProductInfo.Features:
1/3" Sony Super HAD CCD image sensor, 420 TV Lines, 3.6mm Pinhole Lens, 4.75" Diameter Case, Smoke Detector Disguised, DC 12V Power Supply, 300mA Power Consumption
Signal System: NTSC. Scanning System: 2 to 1 Interlace. Effective Pixels: 510 (H) x 492 (V)
Minimum Illumination: 0.1 LUX. S/N Ratio: over 48 dB. Synchronous system: internal, negative sync.
Video Output: 1.0 1.0 Vp-p, 75 Ohms. Operation Temperature: -4°F to 122°F.
Color: white. Dimension: 4.75" x 4.75" x 2.5". Weight: 0.25 lbs. Package contents: covert camera x 1, user's manual x 1, screw x 2.
ProductInfo.Name: R-Tech Smoke Detector Covert CCTV Camera with 1/3" Sony Super HAD Color CCD, 420TVL, 3.7mm Pinhole Lens for Security Surveillance System
